nodes.text: Foodstuff, or food, was nourishment needed for sentient beings to survive. Many fruit, such as jogan fruit, were a type of food. On Imperial starships, officers were encouraged to avoid consuming solid food and drink nutritive beverages instead, because it was more efficient in terms of ship resources and officer time. Food included cakes, fruit and ration packs.
Some types of food contained bones; when Peli Motto instructed her pit droids to fetch food for Grogu, she asked them to get something with bones in it.
